text: , born on 9 December 1963, is the wife and empress consort of the current Emperor of Japan, Naruhito, the eldest son of the previous emperor Akihito, who took the throne after abdication of the latter on 30 April 2019. ==Titles and styles== *9 December 1963 – 9 June 1993: Miss Masako Owada *9 June 1993 – 30 April 2019: Her Imperial Highness The Crown Princess of Japan *Her Imperial Highness The Crown Princess Masako *1 May 2019 – present : Her Majesty The Empress of Japan ==References== ==Other websites== * Who2 profile * Australian author of Princess Masako biography receives death threats * Hello! Magazine | Japan's Masako * Imperial Household Denies Exerting Pressure Over Masako Book, 19 February 2007 * Website of Ben Hills, author of Prisoner of the Chrysanthemum Throne * The Sunday Times | Land of the rising daughter 4 June 2006 Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese imperial family Category:People from Tokyo Category:Crown Princes and Princesses of Japan Category:Empresses consort
title: Empress Masako
